sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
plunges in a particular direction
, pade v določeno smer.

seg.quote: The car plunged into the river.
They plunged into the pool together.
They were relying on the plunge into icy waters to kill me.

sense.def:
To plunge an object into something
pomeni neki predmet hitro in na silo potisniti v nekaj.

seg.quote: She plunged her hands into her coat pockets.
He plunged the knife into her breast.

sense.def:
To plunge someone or something into a state
pomeni povzročiti, da se nekdo ali nekaj nenadoma znajde v določenem položaju.

seg.quote: The hall was plunged into darkness.
...the danger of plunging society into chaos and anarchy.

sense.def:
To plunge into an activity
pomeni, da nekdo naenkrat začne nekaj delati.

seg.quote: She plunged bravely into the debate.

sense.def:
Kadar količina ali stopnja
plunges
, se hitro in nenadoma zmanjša.

To take the plunge
pomeni odločiti se, da bomo naredili nekaj, kar se nam zdi težavno ali tvegano.

seg.quote: Take the plunge and start your own firm.
